alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN ROOKS AND WESTERN OSBORNE COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natoma, or 21 miles north of Emmeram, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alton around 635 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
